body_html: This is maybe a very stupid mistake but might help someone... I downloaded just CUDA 8 patch from the site and was wondering, why the error. Apparently, the patch does not care if you have CUDA 8 already installed, it just copied the dll and creates the intermediary directories, even looks like Cuda is installed in installed applications.

body: This is maybe a very stupid mistake but might help someone... I downloaded just CUDA 8 patch from the site and was wondering, why the error. Apparently, the patch does not care if you have CUDA 8 already installed, it just copied the dll and creates the intermediary directories, even looks like Cuda is installed in installed applications.
